content_security_policy: img-src 'self' https://*.flickr.com https://*.staticflickr.com; script-src 'self' https://*.flickr.com  https://*.staticflickr.com; object-src 'self' https://*.flickr.com  https://*.staticflickr.com
name: searchr!
description: An easy-to-use flickr photo search app for Chrome!
